title: GTA 6 - 10 BRAND NEW DETAILS
description:
The announcement of a new GTA game is an event to be celebrated in and of itself, and that, in fact, has never been truer than it is now. After a decade of waiting, which is far longer than anyone would have thought it would take for Rockstar to move on from GTA 5, Grand Theft Auto 6 has finally been officially unveiled. 

True to form for Rockstar announcements, the reveal trailer isn’t a particularly long one, but in just a minute and a half, it still manages to pack in a number of intriguing details that paint an exciting picture of the game that we’ll be playing in 2025. 

Here, we’re going to talk about a few such details in GTA 6 that you should know.
